body.name: Cream Moisturizer, Rich Hydrating Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, with Shea Butter and Hyaluronic Acid, 1.7 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: ULTRA-CREAMY & RICH – This luxurious skin care product helps keep skin soft and hydrated all day long

LOCKS IN MOISTURE – Shea butter delivers skin-softening effects while glycerin, aloe, and hyaluronic acid help draw water into your skin to keep it hydrated, squalane and allantoin condition and help support your skin barrier

LEVEL UP YOUR ROUTINE – Designed for those with dry, stressed, and sensitive skin. Use as a daily face lotion and night cream. Perfect for men, women, teens, or anyone looking to complement their existing routine
CLEAN & EFFECTIVE FORMULA – Dermatologist-designed, fragrance-free, sulfate-free and paraben-free, 100% vegan, cruelty-free skincare, Leaping Bunny Certified
CUROLOGY – Dermatologist founded, developed, and tested

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I *love* this moisturizer. Finally, after years of trial and error, I found a moisturizer that works with my skin. It's sensitive, very oily in some spots, and dry in random spots. This is the first moisturizer to not burn my skin. I don't *feel* it on my face. I don't get oily as the day goes on. In fact I feel like it's helping clear up my blackhead! Somehow.. some way. It's perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydrates skin and keeps bumps and dry appearance.
reviews.reviewText: I love to have this in jars to accommodate using at vanity or when traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars High quality moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I have used moisturizers that I prefer for night time because they are heavy, others for day because they are thin and light. Curology's Cream Moisturizer has a consistency somewhere in the middle. It is creamy but doesn't leave any residue or film on my skin. After I've applied it, I can move on to applying my makeup without having to wait for it to absorb. Alternately, it works well as a final layer at bedtime over one of two serums I'm currently using. It has not caused any irritation or clogged pores. It doesn't really have a scent which I appreciate, since it doesn't conflict with any other skin care products I'm using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great every day moisturizer. Very hydrating and doesn't feel heavy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this moisturizer but the container is awful. Jake the time when I press down on it nothing comes out no matter how many times I do it. I might not buy this one again because of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This facial moisturizer is thick with a milky, non-sticky, and non-oily texture. It absorbed nicely into my skin leaving it feeling very hydrated. I have mixed feelings about the bottle design as it dispenses the same amount for each pump so if I just need a little more for my neck it isn’t possible. I am not sure how the design works when the product gets low; is there moisturizer that is wasted and left in the bottom of the bottle? On the positive side, it keeps the moisturizer clean as you don’t have to dip your fingers into a jar. According to an ingredient checker, the ingredient list is clean without concerning additives. Along those lines, I appreciate the brand’s commitment to being cruelty-free, as well as sulfate free, fragrance-free, and paraben-free. This is a very nice moisturizer, especially during the winter months, and I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used curology before and know I can count on them. Their customer service is great and the products do not fall behind. They built a reputation treating skin problem, so I was excited to try this moisturizer. It left my skin soft and protected. It’s not too heavy for a night lotion, so I can use every night. I’d use it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Curology is the best
reviews.reviewText: Curology Cream Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Hyaluronic Acid is another outstanding skincare product. Developed by dermatologists , the composition of natural hydrating ingredients and hyaluronic acid, aid in giving skin a youthful glow. Easy on sensitive skin and lacking in fake dyes and perfumes. This vegan cruelty free moisturizer is easily dispensed from air pump container.
